name: Monster House (itch) (Matthew Drakely)
description:
This Game was supposed to be out by Halloween but got held up with other projects. here is the game for you all to try.

Controls for Devil Tank:

WASD to Move, F to shoot

Corruption Tank Controls:

Arrow Keys To Move, ? to Shoot

Goal: Damage the opponent as much as you can before time runs out.

Bonus Tip: Monsters Damage you and Gives a Point to the Opponent
